select.if: select r.*, u.username from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id = p.id order by r.heart desc
select r.*, u.username from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id = p.id order by r.id desc

mapper.select: select r.*, u.username from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id where review_category_id=#{reviewCategoryId}
select u.username, u.id as user_id, r.* from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id where r.id=#{id}
select u.id as user_id, r.*, u.* from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on u.id = r.user_id where user_id=#{userId}
